page.title: 12Churches in Ulverston
page.content: Ulverston has been involved in many religious movements and religion plays a distinctive part in the life of the town today. The{Quakers}have a Meeting House.The{Methodists}have an active Church. There is a well supported { {Anglican Church}of St.Mary's.The{Roman {Catholic Church}is also thriving. Recent years have seen the growth of the Charismatic Movement in all churches which has strengthened the Christian tradition of the town. Many{ {house groups}exist for the purpose of teaching and fellowship. There is much contact between all churches with joint meetings and projects. Anglican and Roman Catholic Churches have Primary Schools and many Churches provide{Youth Groups.}All churches see witnessing to Christ as their main function. {Jehovah's Witnesses}are also active.
